item.title: Kate add a quote by Jalal Ad-Din Rumi
item.description:
"Out beyond ideas of wrongdoing and rightdoing there is a field. I'll meet you there.
When the soul lies down in that grass the world is too full to talk about." -- Jalal Ad-Din Rumi

item.title: Kate add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Who could be so lucky? Who comes to a lake for water and sees the reflection of moon." -- Rumi

item.title: Kate add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "If you are irritated by every rub, how will your mirror be polished?" -- Rumi

item.title: Kate add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "I love you as certain dark things are to be loved, in secret, between the shadow and the soul." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Kate add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Kate add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Kate add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Kate add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Kate add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Kate add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Kate add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Kate add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Kate add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination. Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Kate add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "It is what you read when you don't have to that determines what you will be when you can't help it." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Kate add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "I have never let my schooling interfere with my education." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Kate add a quote by A.A. Milne
Kate add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Kate add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "For most of history, Anonymous was a woman." -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: Kate add a quote by E.E. Cummings
item.description: "It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are." -- E.E. Cummings

item.title: Kate add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Kate add a quote by Maurice Switzer
item.description: "It is better to remain silent at the risk of being thought a fool, than to talk and remove all doubt of it." -- Maurice Switzer

item.title: Kate add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Kate add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Kate add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Kate add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Kate add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Kate add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Kate add a quote by Apple Computer Inc.
item.description: "Here's to the crazy ones. The misfits. The rebels. The troublemakers. The round pegs in the square holes. The ones who see things differently. They're not fond of rules. And they have no respect for the status quo. You can quote them, disagree with them, glorify or vilify them. About the only thing you can't do is ignore them. Because they change things. They push the human race forward. And while some may see them as the crazy ones, we see genius. Because the people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do." -- Apple Computer Inc.

item.title: Kate add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Kate add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Remember, if the time should come when you have to make a choice between what is right and what is easy, remember what happened to a boy who was good, and kind, and brave, because he strayed across the path of Lord Voldemort. Remember Cedric Diggory." -- J.K. Rowling
